entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 near midnight then light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
